'''Radiant Spincrystal 98''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Sorush's Purity]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on a building to the East of the [[Iniquitous Baptist]] boss.
